column5: I am looking to fish for my first time on crowe lake, is there a place I can rent a fishing boat for a day?  I am having trouble finding anything online related to boat rentals on that lake, and hope to find someone in the forum here who has great knowledge on the lake and just where I could rent a boat on the day I choose to fish...  Thanks in Advance...  Inker
Try to call Chris' live bait in Marmora they may Know some where to rent.  17 Marmora Mine Marmora, ON K0K 2M0 (613) 472-2832
Not sure about the boat rentals, but its a good fishery!  Lots of Bass/Pike in there!  Bring your camera!
Try Blairton trailer park. They used to have one rental boat. Other than that, I don't think there are any rentals.....  Booster park might have them, but I'm not sure.  Sinker
